HERO.NAME: Kacper
HERO.TITLE: I create modern web applications with Angular.
HERO.LEAD: I graduated with a Master's degree in Applied Computer Science from Jagiellonian University. Currently, I work as a Front-end Developer at Comarch, where I develop a reporting system for time tracking and report generation — tailored to the needs of both small and large companies.
HERO.STATEMENT: I work daily with the latest versions of Angular, focusing on quality, performance, and modern UX. I have experience in ERP sector projects and co-create scalable, user-friendly solutions. I passionately follow the development of artificial intelligence and implement its capabilities into everyday work to continuously improve productivity and efficiency of delivered systems.

STACK.TOOLS: GIT (GitLab/GitHub), JIRA, CI/CD, Google Workspace, Figma
STACK.AI_TOOLS: AI Tools: GitHub Copilot, Google Gemini, ChatGPT, Claude Code

COMARCH_CLOUD.HIGHLIGHT_1: I collaborate daily with UX and backend teams, ensuring refined UX and meeting business needs.
COMARCH_CLOUD.HIGHLIGHT_2: I modernize and refactor the application: library updates, architecture improvements, and code maintainability.
COMARCH_CLOUD.HIGHLIGHT_3: I modernized the project (Angular 14 → 20): migration to standalone components, OnPush, and Signals; reduced dependency on zone.js.
COMARCH_CLOUD.HIGHLIGHT_4: I co-create a product for a new client; working in a dynamically developing project.
COMARCH_CLOUD.HIGHLIGHT_5: I consciously use AI tools (GitHub Copilot, ChatGPT, Google Gemini) to increase work efficiency and quality.

COMARCH_HEALTHCARE.HIGHLIGHT_1: Onboarding to the organization and working with tools: Jira and GitLab.
COMARCH_HEALTHCARE.HIGHLIGHT_2: Development of an internal application module: collecting statistics from the application and presenting them in a view.
COMARCH_HEALTHCARE.HIGHLIGHT_3: Creating charts and clear data visualization (including Chart.js).
COMARCH_HEALTHCARE.HIGHLIGHT_4: Writing unit tests for the statistics module (Jasmine, Karma).
COMARCH_HEALTHCARE.HIGHLIGHT_5: Implementation and maintenance of the application in Angular (Angular 15).
